description: This file is a test specification for the Vue component 'HelloWorld', testing its rendering behavior using Vitest.

methods.name: describe
methods.description: Defines a test suite for 'HelloWorld' component

methods.name: it
methods.description: Defines a test case to verify the rendering of the component

methods.name: expect
methods.description: Assertion method to verify the component's text content

ctags.name: wrapper
ctags.pattern: /^    const wrapper = mount(HelloWorld, { props: { msg: 'Hello Vitest' } })$/
